summary: A film school is the center of a fresh spate of killings based on urban legends.
cast: Jennifer Morrison|Matthew Davis|Hart Bochner|Loretta Devine|Joey Lawrence|Anson Mount|Eva Mendes|Jessica Cauffiel|Anthony Anderson|Michael Bacall|Marco Hofschneider|Derek Aasland|Jacinda Barrett|Peter Millard|Chas Lawther|Chuck Campbell|Yani Gellman|Jeannette Sousa|Rory Feore|Shauna Black|Leland Tilden|Joel Gordon|David Cook|Bianca Muller|Jenny Kim|Nicole Crozier|Pat Kelly|Stephanie Moore|Kevin Hare|David Sparrow|Clare Preuss|Santo|Rebecca Gayheart|Barry Koen-Butt|Christie McNew|Rana Morrison|John Ottman
title: Leyenda urbana 2
